title: Person Medium Light Skin Tone White Hair
alsoKnownAs: White Haired Person Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A person with white hair and a medium-light skin tone. Often used to represent an elder, someone wise, or a distinguished individual.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this emoji depicts a person with a medium-light skin tone and striking white hair, rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and realistic lighting. The white hair has a subtle sheen, suggesting texture and depth, while the overall expression is neutral and approachable, embodying maturity and wisdom. It's a versatile representation for individuals or to signify age and experience in digital conversations.
